paper.title: Research on Credit Risk Appraisement of Chinese Commercial banks
paper.abstract: A series of abnormal alteration of macro-economic and financial indexes often causes the credit risk of banks. The paper selects nine indexes containing three aspects. Firstly, it works out the factors' score and the credit risk index of each aspect. And then, carries through the regression analysis and finds out the most influent factors of credit risk of commercial banks.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究商业银行的信用风险评估，通过回归分析找出影响信用风险的关键因素，这属于金融风险管理的范畴。
